title: HELP! Account Taken
body:
If there are any admins capable of locking my account and resetting the email please contact me ASAP.

Summoner Name: ISACrew

I'll happily provide proof of ownership once the account is suspended
Deals gone wrong situation

replies.body:
Submit a support ticket, and don't post identifying information on boards.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
